Class MazeSearchable

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.demo.MazeSearchable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searchable

    public class MazeSearchable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searchable
    The MazeSearchable class becomes maze to maze that we can run on it search algorithm

    1.0

                      double stepDiagonallyCost)
        This constructor creates us MazeSearchable
        Parameters:
        maze - The maze we want to make MazeSearchable
        withDiagonals - True if allow to walk on diagonals
        start - The cell that the searcher start
        goal - The cell that the searcher stop
        normalcost - The value of normal step
        stepDiagonallyCost - The value of diagonally step
